name: Young Kruthik
senses: darkvision 30 ft., tremorsense 60 ft., passive Perception 10

abilities.name: Keen Smell.
abilities.description: The kruthik has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

abilities.name: Pack Tactics.
abilities.description: The kruthik has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kruthik's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

abilities.name: Tunneler.
abilities.description: The kruthik can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 2 1/2-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.
